javadoc: DBFieldMap provides a database-backed map of non-unique Field values to long values.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Construct a new map.
 A temporary database is used to provide storage for the map.

params.name: fieldClass
params.comment: specifies class of Field values to be stored in this map.

params.name: cacheSizeMB
params.comment: size of data cache in MBytes.

methods.javadoc:
Dispose all resources associated with this map.
 This method should be invoked when the map is no longer needed.
methods.name: dispose
methods.comment:
Dispose all resources associated with this map.
 This method should be invoked when the map is no longer needed.

methods.name: addEntry
methods.comment:
Add the specified value pair to this map.
 If the entry already exists, this method has no affect.

methods.name: deleteEntry
methods.comment: Delete the specified value pair from this map.

return.comment: true if entry exists and was deleted

methods.name: hasEntry
methods.comment:
Determine if the specified value pair exists within this map.
 (This method provided for test purposes).

name: DBFieldMap
comment: DBFieldMap provides a database-backed map of non-unique Field values to long values.
